publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2504# Mr Duncan Hamilton: Minister for Highlands and Islands-That the Parliament recognises that the Highlands and Islands have unique needs; notes that the case for the needs of the Highlands and Islands areas needs to be made at the highest levels of government; regrets the decision of the First Minister to drop the role of 'Minister for the Highlands and Islands' from the Scottish Executive and calls upon the First Minister to reinstate this role.
S1M-2504# Minister for Highlands and Islands (lodged on 4 December 2001) Fergus Ewing*

S1M-2504# Mr Duncan Hamilton: Minister for Highlands and Islands-That the Parliament recognises that the Highlands and Islands have unique needs; notes that the case for the needs of the Highlands and Islands areas needs to be made at the highest levels of government; regrets the decision of the First Minister to drop the role of 'Minister for the Highlands and Islands' from the Scottish Executive and calls upon the First Minister to reinstate this role. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
